Name: sin-naseemismailand-lad
Author: Naseem Ismail And Masoor Maulana, Kaleel

Translations.Text: (nabiyē!) ema siddhiya asaval eka yayi oba dannehida
edinadī minisun ævissī visirī tikhena meru men bavaṭa pat vanu æta
kan̆du visirī dæmū puḷun men pāvī yanu æta
kavurungē pin vala bara væḍi vūvēda
ohu tṛptiyaṭa pat jīvitayehi (sæpasē) jīvatva siṭinu æta
kavurungē (pin vala) bara pahasu vī (pāpayanhi bara væḍi) vūvēda
(ema) hāviyā asaval eka yayi (nabiyē!) oba dannehida
